message: Let's be fair, Bob. Take this deal before inflation eats away at your share!
Alice, my turn. I understand you value fairness, but inflation hits me harder. Let's be practical.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's getting risky for both of us. Let's be sensible and end this.
Alice, this is it.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option left.  Any less and the inflation makes it pointless for either of us.
